entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 a.m. MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 6:00 AM MST Friday 21 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 82 %

Dewpoint: -10.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 21 April 2023
